order-summary.title: Confirm {{buyOrSell}}
order-summary.name: Name
order-summary.premium-info: The difference between the Uniswap market price and Net Asset Value of the Set.
order-summary.buy-fee-description: This buy fee is used to deter arbitrage via oracle price mismatches. This buy fee is distributed to all existing {{setName}} holders.
order-summary.sell-fee-description: This sell fee is used to cover the gas costs of maintaining reserves.
order-summary.negative-order-total-warning: Warning! The gas cost required to execute this trade exceeds the value of tokens you will receive.
order-summary.slippage-warning: Warning! This Set is trading at a {{slippage}} premium on Uniswap. If you are {{buyOrSell}} quantities of {{tokenName}} greater than $50,000 USD please
order-summary.contact-us: contact a team member for assistance.

modals.completed-description: You can review your transaction below, and view your balance on your Account page shortly.
modals.long-description: Please monitor your transaction using the link below, or try again.
modals.failed-description: Your {{buyOrSell}} order could not be processed. Please review your transaction at the link below and try again.
modals.imtoken-completed: You can track the progress of your transaction in your account page.

uniswap-errors.default: Your {{buyOrSell}} request could not be completed.

api-errors.insufficient-liquidity: There is not enough liquidity to service this order. Please contact us for more information.
api-errors.eth-gas-cost: The ETH gas cost exceeds the value of this transaction.
api-errors.insufficient-reserves: There are insufficient reserves to service this order. Please wait or contact us if you would like to sell a quantity >2% of this Set's TVL.
api-errors.minimum-issuance-not-met: This buy order does not meet the minimum quantity threshold. Please try again with a larger quantity.
api-errors.exceeds-buy-sell-limit: This Set cannot accept transaction sizes greater than 200k USD. Please try again with a smaller quantity.
api-errors.default: We could not fetch a transaction price for this order. Please try a different quantity.
